description:
Build a unified toast notification system for background operations like test generation, data seeding, and report generation. Include success, error, and info variants with auto-dismiss timers.

**Rationale:** Users initiate async actions and need confirmation when they complete or fail without being interrupted by modal dialogs that block workflow.
title: Toast notification system for async operations
